entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TapGestureRecognizer disregards parent's IsEnabled status on iOS and Catalyst. #18995
  • FlyoutItem and MenuItem styles don't work #18994
  • .NET MAUI Blazor NavigationManager.Refresh() causes a flicker of a white page #18993
  • Add Support for KeyedServices #18992
  • [testing] The test ShapeUpdatesBrushCorrectly sometimes fails on iOS #18991
  • [testing] xharness can't boot and install app on 14.5 simulators with macOS Sonoma #18989
  • RefreshView indicator is behind Content Page Title #18987
  • [tests] Fail on EnsureCellSizesAreCached DeviceTest iOS 15.4 and 14.5 #18985 #18986
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [tests] Regression on WebView HandlerLeak DeviceTest iOS 15.4 and 14.5 #18985
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Page Layout is not applied correctly #18984
  • [iOS] Image layout issue in MAUI 8 (regression, worked correct in MAUI 7) #18983
  • Modal navigation not working when the window is not active #18982
  • [Testing] App.EnterText not working with iOS password #18981
    Backlog
  • Order of priority between Styles.xaml and custom css has changed in .net 8 #18980
  • Accesibility issue with Label selection in Windows and Android #18978
  • IsEnabled not working properly for layout #18977
  • DataTrigger do not restore the original value anymore (Regression, broken in MAUI 8) #18976
  • ScrollView with Fill vertical option is bigger than the page when ScrollView is a root on iOS #18975
  • Shell and TabbedPage #18974
  • Issue with android application context in .net 8 #18973

Closed

  • Android: FileNotFoundException only in Release-Mode when using System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo(...) #17932
  • [iOS] Scrollviewer not scrolling #11558
    Backlog
  • Using Nightly builds (8.0.0-nightly) breaks packages that require >= 8.0.3 #18931
    Backlog
  • Safe area layout guide not working in MAUI .NET8 on iOS 17.1.1 #18969
  • NullReferenceException on MemoryMarshal.TryGetArray (iOS only) #18761
  • Hot Reload Performance #13051
  • Add support for WiX Toolset Harvest Tool (Heat) HarvestProject element #16096

PullRequests

Created

  • [Catalyst] Allow setting of MaximumTrackColor on Slider when using Mac Idiom #18990
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • Revert "Prevent iOS CollectionView size shifts from clearing the cell size cache" #18988
    area/testing, testing-flakiness, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing
  • Disallow `NaN`s in `Rect` sizes #18971
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18970
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Update GitInfo.txt to 8.0.4 for nightlies #18963

Updated

  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #14456
    area/essentials 🍞, stale, Under Consideration
  • Improves performance on BindableProperty #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [testing] Run tests on device #17808
    area/testing
  • Fix for button cornerradius 0 on android #18959
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Add Layout UITests #18923
    area/layout 🔲, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 SR3
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test E1 #18624
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset from 4.7.0 to 4.8.0 #18944
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [tests] Add runs on iOS17 #18962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR1
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-webview, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
  • Bump the androidx group with 16 updates #18943
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18942
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #18941
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [WinUI] Fix resizing CV rows when content size changed #18932
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
